attributes.action: All UK governments should follow a 15 year plan to end use of fossil fuels
attributes.additional_details: The rising sea level will be the end of so many beautiful places - we as the human race should not be held accountable for the eradication of such islands as The Maldives or the Pacific Islands. Additionally the same applies for many species or in the rainforest- there is so much undiscovered, why should we be able to destroy it?
attributes.background: We are destroying our planet and there is no planet B. We need to take action. Too much of political power is currently focused on Brexit - and it is going nowhere. We need to act now or we may regret it the future of the human race - or lack thereof.
